text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActMoodPromise

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood where concept is-a PRMS

name: ActMoodPromise
title: ActMoodPromise
description: An intent to perform a service that has the strength of a commitment, i.e., other parties may rely on the originator of such promise that said originator will see to it that the promised act will be fulfilled. A promise can be either solicited or unsolicited.
